text: Hijiyama-bashi is a Hiroden station (tram stop) on Hiroden Hijiyama Line, located in Hijiyama-hon-machi, Minami-ku, Hiroshima. ==Routes== From Hijiyama- bashi Station, there are one of Hiroden Streetcar routes. *25px Hiroshima Station - (via Hijiyama-shita) - Hiroshima Port Route ==Connections== ;█ Hijiyama Line :25px ::Hijiyama-shita — Hijiyama-bashi — Minami-kuyakusho-mae ==Around station== *Hijiyama Park *Hijiyama River *Hijiyama Bridge ==History== *Opened on December 27, 1944 ==See also== *Hiroden Streetcar Lines and Routes ==External links== Hijiyama-bashi Station Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1944
title: Hijiyama-bashi Station
